roleset.name: take back material goods
roleset.note: REPOSSESS-V NOTES: Member of Vncls steal-10.5. (from repossess.01-v)

roles.note: Could be a 'source' argument ("The bank repossessed the car fromJohn"). No examples in corpus. (from repossess.01-v)

example.name: repo man
example.text: After [Laurel Bank]-1 tried *trace*-1 to repossess the car, a vice president asked him to intervene in an unrelated legal dispute involving a trust account.
